org.apache.savan.configuration
Class MappingRules

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.savan.configuration.MappingRules
public class MappingRules
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates a date of a set of Mapping-Rules as defined by Savan configurations. (probably from a savan-config.xml file).
